title: In the last week, I have suddenly been unable to search for anything.
content: I found that suddenly, when I type in my search request, the screen flashes, but I end up with my home screen, and no search results. I can still connect to saved sites without any problems, but have found I cannot search for anything at all. Hoping full functionality can be restored.
creator: lwills52

title: pdf viewer not saving my edits. much hard work lost...
content: The firefox pdf viewer is still buggy and annoying. When i make changes to a document not only does it not save automatically, but when i manually save it (and have to choose the save location every time...) it fails half the time and my hard work goes to waste. What gives?
creator: jd.ackaws

title: The site always Auto-reload3 times
content: When I open safeway.com with private window, the site always auto-reload3 times but the regular firefox window doesn't do it. Also, I tried other browers such as chrome and brave, they don't auto-reload either. I am only experiencing this with firefox private window.
creator: jimmymc1212
